attributes.action: Put IHCD Ambulance Technicians on the HCPC register.
attributes.background: Technicians respond to and deal with 999 medical emergencies, usually working autonomously yet they are not on the same register as a Paramedic. It is estimated there are the same amount of Technicians as Paramedics working on the road, if not more.

rejection.details:
Your petition seems to be calling on the Health and Care Professionals Council, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action. 

You can find out how to contact the HCPC here:

http://www.hpc-uk.org/aboutus/contactus/
